geometry.proportions: 1:1 square canvas, generous breathing room around object
geometry.element_arrangement: single centered main object, with subtle sparkle particles or tiny golden motes floating nearby

composition.spatial_depth: subtle depth with gentle elevation, no dramatic perspective
composition.scale_consistency: strictly consistent size and visual weight across entire set

lighting.type: soft diffuse daylight with subtle warm inner glow
lighting.light_source: top-left or top-center, evenly spread, with faint ambient radiance from object
lighting.shadow: very soft grounding shadow with subtle golden tint, close to object
lighting.highlighting: gentle shimmer on edges, soft golden catchlights suggesting preciousness

textures.material_finish: refined and polished, premium handcrafted quality
textures.surface_treatment: enhanced realism with fine grain details, polished metal surfaces, superior craftsmanship visible

render_quality.edge_definition: soft edges with subtle luminous rim, no hard outlines
render_quality.visual_clarity: clear silhouette, instantly readable at small sizes

color_palette.range: deeper saturated naturals with golden/amber undertones (no neon, no harsh contrast)
color_palette.usage: limited palette per icon, slight warmth shift suggesting value and rarity

icon_style.stylistic_tone: cozy, premium, subtly magical, masterwork-quality, storybook-treasure

icon_behavior.branding_alignment: fits cozy farming / idle game aesthetic while signaling rarity
icon_behavior.interchangeability: cohesive with standard icons but distinctly elevated
